questions.text: Do you have a sore throat?
Do you sneeze or cough more frequently?
Do you suddenly smell or taste less good?
Do you have a temperature (37.5 degrees or higher)?
Do you have a fever (38 degrees or higher)?
Do you have more difficulty breathing when you are sitting or lying quietly?
Are you exhausted after little exertion (for example walking to the toilet)?
Are you breathing faster or more difficult?
Are you feeling more and more ill or were you feeling better at first, but now much sicker or very tired?
Do you have less of an immune system, for example due to a serious illness or medicines that inhibit the immune system?
Do you have heart disease or lung disease for which you are being treated by a specialist?
Do you have kidney disease that requires dialysis?

results.content: There is very little chance you have corona.
There is very little chance you have corona. You are, however, more likely to get sick.
